title: Ranked solo/duo queue down?
body: I played a ranked game and when I  got out of it solo/duo was down and there wasn't any status thing saying it was down.

replies.body:
Also having this issue, just logged on.

also none of the other game types like 3v3 work at all
This is an issue for me as well. I can only select blind normals on the rift.
Are you on the updated client, and on NA?  Have you relogged since last night when the new patch hit?  Can you provide a screenshot?  Let me know.
I just logged back in and it seems to have fixed itself. Thanks for the help anyway!

I have the same issue on NA.  I am currently reloading the legacy client to see if it will allow me to queue for ranked.  I can provide a screenshot when the download is finished.

When I logged in the legacy client the queues showed up properly.
I don't currently see any issues with ranked games availability.  Is this still an issue for you?
Yes, maybe its just in oce?
Everything looks okay!  Have you tried relogging?  Are you on the updated or legacy client, and can you provide a screenshot?
